Variable Documentation

$DefaultMenuTreeDir = 'default'

Change log: 2004-07-29 Alternate menu tree selection system was integrated.

Set the default menu tree directory name here. Version >= 2.0.2 only "default" or "dtree". If empty or non-existing path, defaults to "default".
